Keywords: Carbon and De-carbonization , co2 , epa , mpg , transportation By Dave Rochlin - originally posted on care2.com I love the ambitious new automobile efficiency targets set by the EPA this week. This is long overdue. As the EPA pointed out , "transportation sources accounted for 28 percent of all U.S. greenhouse gas emissions in 2007, and have been the fastest-growing source of U.S. GHG emissions since 1990."
